data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Changed from previous request: Net -> WWW, WebJay -> Webjay.

    I don't know why I capitalized the Jay... The site image looked
    like the J was capitalized, and so, yeah :)

    I saw the Amazon code in Net with another module to access a site,
    and thought that's where they went - but hey, cosmetic change to
    fit, and follow good suggestions.

    The module is a simple frontend for the Webjay API that was just
    published a little while ago, and will be undergoing some changes
    (both the module and the API, I'm sure) as time goes on.
